reviews.review_msg: this class was simply awful.  It seemed that skinner wasn't into it, the entire class was extremely disorganized, lectures were always boring and LONG, made no sense, he mumbled a lot. the TA was an undergrad! (yeah)- he just seemed unintersted in the subject,like he was forced to be there.

He reminds me of the teacher from Charlie Brown "Blah Blah Bulp Blah Blah." Very nice guy, and approachable- but very confusing and hard to follow lectures (that were entirely too long and boring!) Should of slept in more...
Skinner is wicked. So funny, makes almost everything interesting but doesn't make it  easy. Should be an extra class for just his stories
This guy is awesome! Don't let the haters keep you from taking his classes. This prof knows his stuff and if you are prepared to work hard you will do well.
